feedback.question: What features would you like to see in an innovative digital banking service?
feedback.results: The majority of respondents are interested in personalized financial advice and management tools based on spending habits and goals. Many also desire the ability to easily open and manage multiple accounts within the app and access to financial advice from experts. Customized alerts for certain transactions or account activity is another feature mentioned quite frequently. Easy loan and credit applications are also requested by several respondents, particularly small business owners. The convenience and user- friendliness of the service are also mentioned by many respondents. Overall, personalized financial services and convenience seem to be top priorities for potential customers.

feedback.question: What concerns do you have about using a digital banking service?
feedback.results: The majority of respondents expressed concerns about the security of their personal and financial information when using a digital banking service. They expect strong security measures to be in place to protect against fraud, data breaches, hacking, and identity theft. Other key concerns include reliability of the service, ease of use, transparency about fees and charges, and quality of customer support. These concerns are largely consistent among a diverse group of respondents, suggesting that addressing security and reliability issues will be paramount in attracting and retaining customers. Additionally, many respondents emphasized the importance of user-friendliness and technical support for users who may not be very tech-savvy.

feedback.question: How frequently do you use mobile banking services?
On a scale of 1-10, how important is it for you to have a seamless and user-friendly mobile banking experience?
What would motivate you to switch to a new digital banking service?
feedback.results: Many respondents mentioned personalized financial advice and management tools, which suggests a desire for tailored experiences rather than generalized services. Competitive rates and fees were also highly valued by many, suggesting a price sensitivity. A user-friendly interface was consistently mentioned, as well as good customer service and better security measures. Innovative features and tools, including a community-focused experience, were also appreciated by some, reiterating the importance of uniqueness and differentiation from competitors. Overall, respondents most valued concrete financial benefits (i.e. better rates, personalized advice) and good user experience (i.e. interface, support, security).

feedback.question: On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you to use our new innovative digital banking service?
What specific aspects of our new digital banking service appeal to you?
feedback.results: The responses emphasize key features of the proposed digital banking service that consumers find appealing. The top features include personalized financial advice and budgeting tools, ability to open and manage multiple accounts (including checking, savings, and investment accounts) within the app, access to financial advice from experts through the app, and customized alerts for certain transactions or account activities. The respondents appreciate these features as they help them manage their finances effectively, stay informed and in control of their finances, and achieve their financial goals. The feature of applying for loans and credit directly through the app with quick response times is also highlighted as a convenient feature. Strengths of the service mentioned across responses include community-focused and machine learning to facilitate personalized advice and tools. Overall, this suggests that the highlighted features are important and may contribute towards attracting new members.

feedback.question: What changes or additions would make you more likely to use our new digital banking service?
feedback.results: The majority of respondents value personal growth and innovation, user experience and seamless mobile banking. They want additional features and tools to achieve their financial goals, rewards or incentives for using the app, integration with accounting software, personalized investment advice and lower fees and charges. Other important features were automatic savings plans, options for mobile check deposits and business loans, advanced security measures and a rewards program for frequent use. More innovative features including an ability to import data from other financial apps or services, easy bill splitting, integration with other financial services and even educational support related to users' interests and hobbies also got referenced. Overall respondents considered additional integrations a desirable feature and innovative implementation.
